name: Sum of exactly three values is equal to the target
description:
I will pass you an array of numbers and a target. You need to answer me with a boolean if the sum of three values of the array is equals to the target.

You can't reuse the same value more than one time, like:
- Input: [1,99,99]
  Target: 3
  Answer: false, because you can't sum the same value more than one time 

Examples:
- Input: [0,-1,1,5,9]
  Target: 0
  Answer: true, because 0 + 1 + -1 = 0

- Input: [1,2,3,4] 
  Target: 10
  Answer: false, because you need to sum all 4 values (not 3)  to reach 6

- Input: [-1,1,2,3]
  Target: 7
  Answer: false, beacuse you can't reach the target adding all combinations of the values in the input array, grouping by three values
